abstracts.cdata!:
This transcript, from the session of the
            Executive Directors of the International Bank on
            Reconstruction and Development and the International
            Development Association held Wednesday, June 19, 1991,
            covers only the discussion on the First Structural
            Adjustment Credit for Rwanda.
